description: burnt-orange cover; black and white images at beginning: man with longbow fighting tiger, women standing next to palanquin, old man with staff, man fighting woman in dragon costume; pages of small, fine text
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From The Crescent Moon (Chinsetsu yumiharizuki 椿説弓張月)
text: Illustrations carved by Noguchi Enkatsu, Noguchi Tokunosuke, and Fujimura.
title: The Crescent Moon, vol. 5
